docs.lead_paragraph: When The Times's Personal Health columnist Jane Brody wrote about borderline personality disorder in "An Emotional Hair Trigger, Often Misread," hundreds of readers had questions about the diagnosis and treatment of the troubling condition, characterized by impulsive behaviors, shifting moods and often frequent thoughts of suicide.

headline.main: Teen Moodiness, or Borderline Personality Disorder?

docs.abstract: Dr. Alec Miller responds to readers' questions about borderline personality disorder in adolescents.
docs.snippet: Dr. Alec Miller responds to readers' questions about borderline personality disorder in adolescents.

docs.lead_paragraph: Autism and other development disorders constitute a huge national health burden, and suspicions are growing that one culprit may be chemicals in the environment.
docs.snippet: Autism and other development disorders constitute a huge national health burden, and suspicions are growing that one culprit may be chemicals in the environment.

docs.lead_paragraph: My Thursday column argues that as long as we're looking at reforming the clinical health system, we should also examine public health interventions -- including greater scrutiny of chemicals that may be having harmful effects on us. In particular, I look at autism (for more information about autism, check out the site of the Autism Society of America).
docs.abstract: Autism is just one kind of health risk that may be arising from chemicals around us. And as part of health reform, we should try to reduce those risks as well.
docs.snippet: Autism is just one kind of health risk that may be arising from chemicals around us. And as part of health reform, we should try to reduce those risks as well.

docs.lead_paragraph: Jorge Torres, who represented some of the 10 Americans once charged with child abduction in Haiti, said he would turn himself in to prove he had done nothing wrong.

headline.seo: Man Connected With Americans in Haiti Makes His Case While on the Run

headline.print_headline: Man Connected With Americans in Haiti Makes His Case While Still on the Run

byline.contributor: Blake Schmidt contributed reporting from Managua, Nicaragua, and Clara Villatoro and Gene Palumbo from  San Salvador. Kitty Bennett contributed research.
byline.original: By MARC LACEY and IAN URBINA

docs.lead_paragraph: Bristol Palin plans to make her acting debut in the ABC Family series “The Secret Life of the American Teenager,” ABC News reported on Tuesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: It may only be Tuesday, but it has already been a busy week for the Palin family of Wasilla, Alaska.
docs.abstract: Sarah, Todd and Bristol Palin are all in the news right now.
docs.snippet: Sarah, Todd and Bristol Palin are all in the news right now.

docs.lead_paragraph: Though she and her mother may not be on the best terms with Hollywood these days, Bristol Palin plans to make her acting debut in the ABC Family series "The Secret Life of the American Teenager," ABC News reported on Tuesday.

headline.main: Bristol Palin Will Appear on 'The Secret Life of the American Teenager'

docs.abstract: On the ABC Family show, about an unwed teenage mother dealing with the consequences of her pregnancy, Bristol Palin will play a fictionalized version of herself.
docs.snippet: On the ABC Family show, about an unwed teenage mother dealing with the consequences of her pregnancy, Bristol Palin will play a fictionalized version of herself.
